description:
When you sustain a personal injury, you want to work with a law office that does not just boast experience, but also gets results. At Lepley, Engelman, Yaw & Wilk, LLC, in Williamsport, Pennsylvania, we proudly celebrate more than 30 years in practice, representing injured parties throughout north-central Pennsylvania. During those 30 years, our lawyers have obtained precedent-setting verdicts and numerous awards and distinctions. In fact, for their high ethical standards and long list of successful results in personal injury and other areas, three of our attorneys are AV Preeminent* peer-review rated, the highest rating, through Martindale-Hubbell.

Our team of eight attorneys brings a breadth of knowledge and experience to the table. As a result, our law office competently represents clients in multiple areas of the law, including criminal law, family law, workers' compensation and estate planning. Among other types of cases, we gladly take on the following:

  • Car and trucking accidents
  • Assault and battery - plaintiff
  • Medical malpractice
  • Wrongful death
  • DUI/DWI defense
  • Drug violations
  • Domestic violence and neglect
  • Divorce
  • Child custody
  • Wills

The law office of Lepley, Engelman, Yaw & Wilk, LLC, understands the importance of a strong attorney-client relationship. To ensure we are a good fit for you and you us, we offer free initial consultations. We maintain three office locations to maximize our accessibility and offer both in-person and virtual appointments. We also gladly accept credit cards as payment.
